name: Ghosts!
description:
You wake up on an unknown island, with a torch as your only tool. How long can you survive before the ghosts catch you?

  • Unknown place, every time: each round in Ghosts starts on a new island, generated by the game. No map will help you!
  • Increasing difficulty: sure, you can face the few ghosts of the beginning. But how will you fare when they multiply as the game unfolds?
  • Controller Support: play easily with your Xbox 360 or DualShock controller
